Utterance: Ekhane ebong shekhaneer modhye, spastotai, jodi eti shohoj hoye tobe apnar amar proyojon hobe na, apnar 13 jon therapist thakbe na. Jodi eti shohoj hoye tobe apni emon ekta jibon peten ja apni onek din age cheyechilen. Sutara eti spast je eti itimotyeheti kora shohoj. Karon dekhe mone hochhe apni emon ekjon byakti jara anuprerona onek kathin kaj kore, karon khub kom lokoi achen jara 13 jon therapist-er age chorben na. Sutara je ekta khub bhalo mane. Apni ei somosto therapist-er modhye gechhen etai amader jonno ekta bhalo lakshan. Jaihok, eta kathin. Ekhane ebong shekhane, Jahannam hote jachhe. Hubhu. Thik. Tai ami mone kori amader ek number agradhikar hote hobe apnake ghorer madhyame beche thakar jonno jate amra apnar pochondo moto jibon pete pari. Je je khane amra korchi. Ekhon. Amra ekta chukti likhe nao, kichu dhormoer chukti ache. Karon ami apnake borkhasht korbo jodi apni nijeke hotoya korechen je karon amader ubhoyoketai ei satyer mukhomukhi hote hobe je shekhane jete apnake shekhane jete hobe ebong shekhane jete hole apnake beche thakte hobe.
Thik achhe apni ki guarantee je apni pete paren apni amake kol korte paren ebong ami guarantee debe ami nije pete hobe.
Ami byartho hole apni ki korben?
Break myke pashe. Thik achhe. Tai ami jodi tomake sahayyo na kori, tumi atmahatya korbe. Haan, thik achhe, tobe ami jodi apnake sahayyo kori tobe bhalo.
